reviewText:
Learn how to search online with Google in the comfort and privacy of your own home!

NOTE: This Google computer help video can be watched on televisions with DVD players and on computers which have DVD Drives.

This computer help video Introduces Google to Beginning Computer Users

This computer help video was designed & created by an experienced computer technologies instructor and former adult services librarian

This instructional DVD uses Internet Explorer 6 and 7 for visual demonstrations

Find it With Google! uses search examples which are of special interest to adult computer users

Google DVD Topics Include:
- Introduction to Google
- Basic Web Searches
- Google Weather Forecast
- Google Spell-Checker
- Google Maps & Driving Directions
- How to Find Health & Medical Information
- How to Find Tax Forms

FREE PROGRAM UPDATES
This computer help video never gets out of date! Free updates to this program will be available at [...]

ABOUT THE AUTHOR
Help for the Computer Shy founder Michael Gorzka has been teaching "computer shy" adults how to use personal computers (both Macs & PCs) and various software & Internet applications since 1997.
He has incorporated what he has learned from his teaching experiences into his computer help DVDs and manuals.
